https://my.org/vocabulary/#glossary.label: Glossary
https://my.org/vocabulary/#glossary.definition: Glossaries are collections of terms and their definitions.
https://my.org/vocabulary/#glossary.abstract: Glossaries are collections of terms and their definitions.

https://my.org/vocabulary/#taxonomy.label: Taxonomy
https://my.org/vocabulary/#taxonomy.definition: Taxonomies are classification schemes. Terms in a taxonomy give names to sets of things. Classes are often put into relation via hierarchical relation ships to express super and subclasses of things.

https://my.org/vocabulary/#thesaurus.label: Thesaurus
https://my.org/vocabulary/#thesaurus.definition: Thesauri are word nets. They are informal sets of terms which are put into relation.
